.
How to Enter the Offset Amount
When adjusting benefits in the Veterans Benefits Management System - Awards (VBMS-A), enter the following on the DISABILITY PAY tab of the AWARD ADJUSTMENTS screen:
Tort
in the PAYMENT TYPE field
the offset amount in the ORIGINAL BALANCE field, and
the effective date of the award adjustment in the AWARD EFFECTIVE DATE field.
